name: RK Enterprises
overview:
Established in the year 2002, we, “R. K. Enterprises, Mumbai, India”, are an illustrious manufacturer and supplier of a wide array of Doors & Windows, Claddings and Awnings. Our range of products encompasses Openable Windows in Z and R Series, Automatic Doors, Aluminum Sunscreen, Aluminum Louver Windows, Aluminum Doors, Aluminum Sliding Windows, Aluminium Cladding Sheet, Dry Stone Cladding and Aluminum Composite Panel Cladding.

Our Quality: Since commencement, we pay foremost priority towards maintaining high quality standards in our products & policies. The range offered by us is manufactured using excellent quality material that is sourced from vendors of high repute after scouring the market.

Our Team: Production managers Engineers Quality controllers R&D experts Warehousing & packaging professionals Sales & marketing executives

Infrastructure: We have established a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility at our premises for streamlined execution of the business practices. Sprawling over an extensive area, this facility is empowered with latest machines and advanced technology that enable us to utilize the resources in a judicious manner.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client-centric organization, we strive to maximize the contentment level of our clients in the best possible manner. For this reason, we make sure that quality-approved products are offered to them at incomparable prices.
